    • Constructor Detail

      • Map

        public Map(java.lang.String path,
           App app,
           GameController gameController)
        Class constructor Uses level setup file to create a map with enemies and blocks
        Parameters:
        path - the path to level setup file
        app - the application window the map runs in
        gameController - the game controller that controls the map

    • Method Detail

      • tileAt

        public Tile tileAt(int x,
                   int y)
        Returns tile at a given set of (x,y) coordinates
        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate of the tile
        y - the y-coordinate of the tile
        Returns:
        the Tile at the given coordinates

      • setTile

        public void setTile(Tile tile)
        Replaces tile in level map with tile supplied. The tile to be replaced is the one with the same coordinates as the one given in params
        Parameters:
        tile - the tile that is replacing current tile of same coords

      • tick

        public void tick()
        Runs an ingame tick on all aspects of the map. The methods ticks all tiles, the player, enemies (the player loses a life if at same coords as them), bombs, explosions (players and enemies both lose life if at same coords), checks if player has reached goal tile and occasionally purges lists of unnecessary objects to maintain performance

      • draw

        public void draw(App app)
        Will draw blocks, bombs, enemies, explosions and player to the window
        Specified by:
        draw in interface Displayed
        Parameters:
        app - the application window to be drawn to
